author: Lucy Pasha-Robinson
title: Woman asks people to fund her '$10k spiritual journey around the world'
text:
A woman has apparently launched a crowd-funding effort in the hopes of raising $10,000 (¬£8,000) to fund her ‚Äúspiritual journey around the world.‚Äù
Becca Gronski, a self-proclaimed ‚Äúspiritual teacher, life coach, reiki and crystal healer‚Äù from the US, set up the GoFundMe page in February to realise her dream of helping people achieve their potential. 
Ms Gronski said the money would be used to fund her travels, write a book about her journey and give back to communities by sharing her unique skills for free.

I want to empower people to follow their dreams, learn self love, create their own reality and express true soul expression!‚Äù Ms Gronski wrote.
‚ÄúI believe we should all have the opportunity to have the things we need at our fingertips, whether or not we have the money for them. So, I want to be able to give freely, without worry, to people who have less or just need a helping hand for the moment.‚Äù
However, the account has garnered criticism from those reluctant to fund what some consider to be an extended holiday. 
Becca Gronski describes herself as a crystal healer (Facebook) One Twitter user wrote: ‚ÄúI have an idea for this traveller. Get a job!!"
Another wrote on Facebook : "Why don't you do some good and if you legitimately care so much about people donate it to a charity or actual cause vs your own personal travels."
